圣物-守序: 永恒之门。圣徽。驱散亡灵检定+1。 The Gate of Eternity. Holy symbol. +1 to turn undead rolls.
审判之锤。战锤+2，对抗混乱生物时+4。 Hammer of Judgment. War hammer +2, +4 vs chaotic creatures.

信仰之盾。坚不可摧的水晶盾牌，+2防御。佩戴者对凝视类能力免疫。通过命令词可激活或关闭盾牌上的持续光亮法术。 Shield of Faith. Indestructible crystal shield +2. The wearer is immune to gaze powers. Command word activates and deactivates continual light spell on the shield.

律法简编。小册子。将准备神圣法术所需时间减半（OSE标准规则），或每回合准备的仪式祈祷视为两回合。 Breviary of the Law. Small book. Halves the time required to prepare divine spells (OSE standard rules) or, each turn spent preparing a ritual prayer counts as two.

天使青铜钟。大型物品（需要合计力量25才能携带）。所有听到钟声的守序牧师，其治疗法术的恢复效果翻倍，直至次日黎明。 Bronze Bell of the Angels. Large item (requires a combined strength of 25 to be carried). All lawful clerics who hear the bell chime heal twice the hp with their healing spells until the following dawn.
圣战之甲。+2板甲，对抗法术的豁免检定+2。 Battle Vest of the Holy. Plate mail +2, +2 to saves versus spells.
十字军王冠。守序随从在所有豁免、攻击和伤害掷骰上获得+1加值，忠诚度+2。 Crown of the Crusader. Lawful retainers gain +1 to all saves, attack and damage rolls, and +2 to Loyalty.
大祭司圣袍。长袍（可穿在盔甲外）。防御等级+1，所有豁免+1。 Vestment of the Hierophant. Tunic (may be worn on top of armor). +1 to AC, +1 to all saves.

天冠之锤。+1钉头锤，若由守序角色持用则提升至+3。对抗不死生物时，可闻天界圣歌，30英尺内所有不死生物攻击掷骰、伤害及豁免均受-1减益。 Crowned Mace of the Heavens. mace +1, +3 if wielded by lawful characters. When fighting undead creatures, a heavenly choir is heard, and all undead within 30’ of the mace suffer -1 to attack rolls, damage, and saves.
圣洁法冠。佩戴者可重掷一次失败的豁免检定。 Miter of Holiness. The wearer may reroll a failed save.
